# MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType.indirect

**Case**

An option that enables an instance descriptor memory layout the GPU can populate.

## Declaration

```swift
case indirect
```

## Discussion

This instance type corresponds to the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndirectAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptor] memory layout.

## Specifying the instance descriptor type

- **MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType.default**: An option specifying that the instance uses the default characteristics.
- **MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType.userID**: An option specifying that the instance contains a user identifier.
- **MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType.motion**: An option specifying that the instance contains motion data.
- **MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType.indirectMotion**: An option specifying that the instance contains motion data, and enables using an instance descriptor memory layout that the GPU can populate.
